title: Greg Miller's Cancer: Five Years Later
description:
Five years ago, Greg Miller was diagnosed with cancer and missed his first PAX West since he began going. In September 2017, he told PAX West his story.

Donate to or join our Extra Life team and help sick kids by playing video games: http://www.kindafunny.com/extralife

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids
